00141 /***************************************************************/
00142 /* Error codes:
00143          0 -> everything okay
00144         -1 -> resolution finer than available information
00145         -2 -> requested (x,y) location is not in the data set
00146         -3 -> memory problem
00147         -4 -> something else wrong*/
00148 /***************************************************************/
